mean_cn: n. 气质，性格，喜怒无常
mean_en: a person’s or an animal’s nature as shown in the way they behave or react to situations or people; the tendency to get emotional and excited very easily and behave in an unreasonable way
sentence: The female painter had an artistic temperament.
sentence_trans: 这位女画家有艺术气质。
word_etyma: temper脾气 + ament表名词 → 脾气状态 → temperament性情
